WORK EXPERIENCE
APTECH	Karachi, Pakistan	
Front end Developer	
Developed a visually appealing and user -friendly website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript,.
Utilized Bootstrap framework to ensure the website's responsiveness across dif ferent devices.
Implemented innovative JavaScript functionalities such as dynamic forms and interactive elements to enhance user 
experience.	
Extreme Commer ce	Karachi, Pakistan	
Amazon Fba Wholesale	
Identified and evaluated 100+ potential product opportunities through extensive market research and competitor 
analysis, resulting in the approval of 10 profitable brands for listing on  Amazon FBA.
Implemented a comprehensive product hunting strategy, utilizing advanced data analytics tools and techniques to 
increase the success rate of sourcing profitable products
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including suppliers, manufacturers, and brand owners to negotiate favorable 
terms and secure exclusive distribution rights for 5 high-demand products, resulting in a projected sales increase.	
PROJECT EXPERIENCE
Aptech	Karachi, Pakistan	
Front-end developer	
Made a website for a coaching centre called excellent coaching.
Developed and executed a comprehensive marketing strategy for the website of Excellent Coaching Center , resulting 
in an increase in website traffic within the first month.
Implemented SEO techniques to improve the website's search engine rankings, resulting in an increase in or ganic 
traffic and an increase in inquiries from potential students.	
Extr eme Commer ce	Karachi, Pakistan	
Virtual assistant	
Identified profitable products to sell on  Amazon through in-depth market research and analysis, resulting in an 
increase in sales revenue.
Negotiated with suppliers to secure competitive pricing for selected products, resulting in a cost savings
Streamlined the process of getting products into  Amazon's warehouse by implementing efficient logistics strategies, 
reducing shipping time and ensuring timely delivery to customers.
